text: Answer: b, ¢, d Solution: (@)L = {ww|we {a, b}*} is non regular, L* = {4, aaaa, bbbb, aa, bb,ababaa, babaaa ...} We are not able to write regular expression for this. So, it is not regular. (b) L = {far | p is perfect square}, perfect square are (1, 4, 9, 16, 25...} Lou Lt u L2y L3...UL* = a* (regular) (¢) L = {ar| p is prime number}, Prime number (2, 3, 5, 7, 11....} LouU Lt u L2y L3...UL* = a* except a (A + aa*) regular. (d) L = far| p is not a prime number}; not prime (0, 1, 4, 6, 8, 9, 10...) Lou Lt u L2y L3...UL* = a* regular. Answer: b, ¢, d
